title: Bug 7357TableViewer.getElementAt does not behave as documented
description: Bug 7357TableViewer.getElementAt does not behave as documented (I realize that this method is internal to the framework, but either theimplementation or the doc should be corrected)
OB: org.eclipse.jface.viewers.TableViewer.getElementAt(int index)is documented (in JavaDoc) to return null if the index is out of bounds.Butin practice it throws an IllegalArgumentException.
